title: Businesses urged to ‘Paint the Town Greyhound’
text:
Businesses urged to ‘Paint the Town Greyhound’ 0 comments 
Attention Shippensburg Businesses! 
On Friday, Oct. 23, the Shippensburg Greyhound football team takes on their biggest rivals, the Big Spring Bulldogs, at home for the coveted Little Brown Jug.
